dialogues: Guard: Hey you! Stop! Get over here! Who are you?
I'm Mario's brother
Guard: Anyway, I need to write down who comes and goes. Can I see your identification?
I'm sorry, I'm just here to meet a friend
Guard: Anyway, I need to write down who comes and goes. Can I see your identification?
Do you know who you're talking to!?
Guard: But... I need to write down who comes and goes. Can I see your identification?
Can I just go? I'll only be 5 minutes
Guard: ... Fine
Look, it’s kind of late, just write down my name, Luigi
Guard: ... Fine
I’ll need your identification too when i’m firing you!
Guard: I'm sorry sir, please go on.
Desk Girl: Hi handsome! Can i help you? You seem lost in this big building… Where are you trying to go?
Desk Girl: Hi handsome! Can i help you? You seem lost in this big building… Where are you trying to go?
Desk Girl: Hi handsome! Can i help you? You seem lost in this big building… Where are you trying to go?
I was hoping to use the bathroom
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
Can you point me to the stairs? I feel like working my legs a little. I’m meeting my friend
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
I have an appointment with Mr. Mario
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
I’m meeting my brother upstairs. Level 4, which way?
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
Unless you want to go somewhere with me, I’m just looking to get to level 4
Desk Girl: I think I recognize you... Have we met before, sweetie?
I just really need to use the bathroom… I’ll find it on my own, thanks.
I think you’re mistaken. I know my way, thank you.
No wait! I do know you! I think you used to work here! Let me take you where you're headed... don't worry, I insist.
Could be, I’m usually by the bar down the street... [Walk away]
Oh, might be! Good luck on your way to the offices
I don’t have time for this doll [Move to the stairs]
Well, he was cute...
I'm your father
Guard: Hey! Who are you making fun of!? You're not getting in.
I don’t have time for this doll [Move to the stairs]
Well, he was cute...
You: ...
Friend: Hey! Where’ve you been? It’s been so long, I’ve been worried sick!
You: Oh hi… yeah it’s been long.
Friend: You don’t look too happy to see me.
You: oh no it’s not like that, I was just on my way to a meeting.
Friend: Meeting? But you left after that scandal… I thought they fired you!
You: ...I just came up for a quick chat with the boss.
Friend: Wait.. why do you want to see the boss? I don’t know what happened between you two but.... Oh no… I won’t let you meet him, you don’t want to do this!
You: They’re… Alive and well.
Friend: Good to hear. By the way, what are you doing these days?
You: I’m here with a business proposition for the board. Giving them an offer for old times sake.
Wow that’s great! Don’t say anything stupid now.We should hang out sometime.
You: You know I won’t. I’m heading there right now.
Friend: Good luck!
You: Hello.
Friend: It’s nice to see you. Last I heard you’d left the country, and you didn’t return any of our messages. How’re your kids?
You: [Rudely] Sorry, do I know you? I think you’re mistaking me for someone else.
Friend: Oh sorry, but I’m very sure I’ve seen you somewhere before. Do you have an ID?
You: I’m a guest of the CEO. Could you please stop bothering me?
Friend: Oh, my apologies. Have a good day.
You: I work for the accounting department, I just forgot my badge at the desk
Friend: I head the accounting department, I’ve never seen you before. Guards!
